about_the_game: Albatropolis has been freed and Big G and Putzki Jr are running for president! Who will win? Who will cheat? This DLC features new politician costumes; new playable characters; two new PvP Dojo Debate Rooms; and the all new Assimilator Gun for mind controlling your victims during your Rescue Missions! New characters and items are only available in this bundle!
detailed_description: Albatropolis has been freed and Big G and Putzki Jr are running for president! Who will win? Who will cheat? This DLC features new politician costumes; new playable characters; two new PvP Dojo Debate Rooms; and the all new Assimilator Gun for mind controlling your victims during your Rescue Missions! New characters and items are only available in this bundle!

name: Rocketbirds 2: Mind Control DLC

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 64-bit or newer
  • Processor: Dual Core CPU: Intel Core i3 550 @ 3.2 GHz or AMD Athlon II X4
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon HD 5570 or Nvidia GeForce GT 8800
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Supported Controllers: Steam Controller | Microsoft Xbox 360 | Any Direct Input compatible controller
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 64-bit or newer
  • Processor: Quad Core CPU: Intel Core i5 @ 3.3 GHz or AMD Phenom II X6
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon HD 7950 or Nvidia GeForce GTX 660 Ti
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Additional Notes: Supported Controllers: Steam Controller | Microsoft Xbox 360 | Any Direct Input compatible controller

short_description: Albatropolis has been freed and Big G and Putzki Jr are running for president! Who will win? Who will cheat? This DLC features new politician costumes, playable characters, new Dojo Debate Rooms; and the all new Assimilator Gun for Mind Controlling your victims during your Rescue Missions!
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Dutch, Japanese*, Korean, Portuguese - Brazil, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support
